@SMarr311 @EUClimateAction @EU_ENV @WHO_Europe @EU_Commission @Paris Hi, some data is from the past hour but some is older due to time lags between monitoring station, national and our databases, and calculation of the index. There are also different setups for countries, night and day, etc. We're working on further optimising this in the future.

@Axylia_ @Lucie_Pinson_ @urgewald @geraldroux Hi, our service has data from ~2500 out of ~6000 monitoring stations in Europe. Some excluded stations record data only offline or the data would need further processing. Member States select the stations being part of the dataflow. AQ directive sets criteria for sampling points.
@FactFisching A few countries, including Italy, are not sending data to the service yet but we're working on this so that all countries will be covered
